result.eng: Does your father remember those days?

result.eng: I think back of the days of my youth.

result.ponchtml: Cuiṁním siar ar laeṫanta m'óigeI think back of the days of my youth.

result.eng: I was delayed in the airport by three days.

result.eng: We will dispatch your order within three working days.

result.html: An leor trí láAre three days enough?

result.eng: I did a great day's work today.

result.eng: Does she go skiing these days?

result.ponchtml: Cén ċaoi a ḃfuil tú na laeṫanta seoHow are you these days?

result.eng: I'm living in a small town in County Kildare these days.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí i mbaile beag i gContae Chill Dara na laethanta seo

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.orig: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae
result.html: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ag dul di ciall a ḃaint as imeaċtaí an laeShe couldn't make sense of the day's events.

result.eng: She starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.
result.ga: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine
result.orig: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críochnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíche seacht lá in aghaidh na seachtaine

result.ponchtml: Tosaíonn sí ag obair ag 7 30 ar maidin agus críoċnaíonn sí ag 11 00 istoíċe seaċt lá in aġaiḋ na seaċtaineShe starts working at 7.30 in the morning and finishes at 11.00 at night seven days a week.

result.eng: I was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham
result.orig: Bhí mé ag réitiú do mo bhainis nach raibh ach aon lá déag romham

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag réitiú do mo ḃainis naċ raiḃ aċ aon lá déag roṁamI was preparing for my wedding, which was only eleven days before me.

result.eng: It was the night between the two Days of Christmas.
result.ga: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí ann
result.orig: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí ann
result.html: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a bhí annIt was the night between the two Days of Christmas.
result.ponchtml: Eadar an dá Lá Nollag a ḃí annIt was the night between the two Days of Christmas.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: They were a day's walk from the place.
result.ga: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
